Clockwork Venue Platform

Run every shift like clockwork.

Clockwork Venue keeps DJs, hosts, and floor staff synced so nights run smoother, guests stay longer, and revenue follows.

What it replaces: whiteboards, sticky notes, and scattered messages.
What you get: a shared source of truth that updates in real time.

Quick links: DJ/ Host/ Monitor

Modules built for every shift

Rotate, Floor, DJ, Admin, and Reports keep the whole house aligned without bolting on extra tools.

Booth control

Rotate

Smooth stage scheduling and handoffs

  • Advance stages with one tap
  • Timers keep every performer on schedule
  • Set custom stage orders for theme nights
Host tools

Floor

Host tools for assignments, counts, and coordination

  • Track floor checks and table status
  • Log guest spend and comp activity
  • Leave handoff notes for the next shift
Rotation view

DJ

Live rotation board plus cues the whole team can trust

  • Project rotation to monitors across the club
  • See timers and lineup without leaving the booth
  • Drop in announcements and VIP cues
Setup

Admin

Roles, rules, and setup that fits your house

  • Configure stages, shift cadence, and rotation order
  • Manage staff access with role-based permissions
  • Archive nights and reopen them for audits
Nightly insights

Reports

Nightly summaries you can act on

  • Export shifts with counts, spend, and notes
  • Spot trends across weeks and locations
  • Share clean recaps with owners and partners

How a night runs on Clockwork Venue

  1. 1

    Prep the night

    Load tonight's roster, define stage order, and pin any floor priorities or VIP holds.

  2. 2

    Run every shift

    Hosts, DJs, and monitors stay in sync with live rotation, timers, and status boards.

  3. 3

    Review and hand off

    Exports land in inboxes so owners and partners see the story of the night without chasing staff.

Heads-up displays

Mirror the current lineup on any back-of-house monitor so performers know exactly when they are on deck.

Shift memory

Log comps, VIP notes, and floor adjustments that the next team can pick up instantly.

Compliance ready

Keep a clean record of rotations, hours, and staffing for owners, auditors, and investors.

FAQ

Can DJs/hosts log in from the website?

Yes. Use the Log in button or pick DJ / Host / Monitor from the view selector.

Does Clockwork Venue handle payouts or money?

No. We keep operations synced (Rotate, Floor, DJ, Admin, Reports) and leave payments to your existing flow.

We are onboarding a limited set of venues. Contact us for access and pricing that fits your floor.
